duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely operate a collection truck and provide prompt, courteous, and complete waste removal services for customers.
Perform pre- and post-operation inspection of the vehicle to ensure proper working order and report any safety issues.
Operate heavy truck along designated route, service each customer, and dispose of collected material at the designated facility.
Courteously interact with customers, dispatchers, and others on a daily basis to ensure professional service.
Identify unsatisfactory waste containers, tag containers, and monitor waste for unacceptable waste.
Clean areas around accidental waste spills, monitor the condition of the vehicle, and complete required route/productivity sheets and reports.
Maintain adherence to required productivity standards and follow all safety policies and procedures.
Actively participate in the Company’s ReSOP program and perform other job-related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Class B or higher Commercial Driver’s license with air brakes endorsement
